div.p: The Hopatcong Borough School District strives to deliver a 21st Century world-class education and engage all students through the use of innovative instructional practices, technological infusion and rigorous academic experiences with the goal of developing well-rounded and successful students who are college and career ready to meet the ever-changing needs of a global society.
